2019_2022.plot: A young, Black nurse in 1985 apartheid South Africa must face her worst fears when she learns that her activist, younger brother may be in danger when he doesn't return after school. Inspired by actual events.

2019_2022.title: Hand Off
2019_2022.plot: A rugby player admits to having a crush on his best friend/teammate, causing a rift. He retreats into a fantasy world with an imaginary friend, as he struggles to confront his real friend, while trying to fit into the macho world of rugby.

2019_2022.title: Swirl: A Letter to Hair on the Cape Flats
2019_2022.plot: A young hairdresser faces life's big questions when she goes up against her mentor, threatened by her passion and skill for hair. This, while she begins to question all the damage caused by not accepting herself for who she truly is.

2019_2022.title: Leemtes en Leegheid
2019_2022.plot: Magdaleen, a lonely widow in her 80s, creates an imaginary version of her deceased husband to help numb her grief and pain.

2019_2022.title: Meisies Wat Fluit
2019_2022.plot: Henk and Sofia fell in love too soon, got married too soon, and now - getting divorced too soon. He fell madly in love with her free spirit and then stole it from her. She fell in love with his security and then stole it from him.

2019_2022.title: Somerkersfees
2019_2022.plot: A gripping South African Christmas movie about a dysfunctional family and their beach holiday that forces them to come to terms with their flaws, differences, hate, and love for one another.

2019_2022.title: Verstikking
2019_2022.plot: Samuel, the owner of a very lucrative technology company, is robbed by a violent attacker named Nathan, whom he recognizes as a former employee. Samuel does not call the police, but locates... See full summary

2019_2022.title: Vervroegde Aftrede
2019_2022.plot: Everyone at the retirement village is very excited that the new resident is a well-known detective, because every imaginable crime is committed here, from disappearing jewelry to sleeping ... See full summary

2019_2022.title: The Tree
2019_2022.plot: A night like no other in a dangerous neighborhood in Cape Town. A mother leaves her child by himself at night as she searches for a way to earn money to buy his medicine. The child, now ... See full summary

2019_2022.title: Plaashuis
2019_2022.plot: Two women clean a farm murder scene.

2019_2022.title: Posbus 1
2019_2022.plot: Old uncle Ben and his wife received hundreds of Christmas wishes from various hopeful children across the country. But they never opened the letters, as opening one meant opening all - Until now - 30 years later.

2019_2022.title: Miemie (en die meteoriet wat haar definitief gaan tref)
Begrond
2019_2022.plot: A gripping Anglo-Boer War story about building a new future. It tells the story of hope, especially when there is no reason for hope. Hope makes us who we are, because there is always hope - even in the seemingly darkest times

2019_2022.title: The Men Who Speak Gayle
2019_2022.plot: Entertainer Nathan Kennedy, who speaks Gayle, the South African cant that flourished during the Apartheid era, meets Louis van Brakel, a much older user of the secret language, and interviews him on stage at the Showroom, Prince Albert.

2019_2022.title: Agulhas
2019_2022.plot: The storm of life approaches young Angelo's world. Gifted with "sight", Angelo faces a battle between the voice in his heart or a dangerous existence at sea.
